channel.title: Vid Card
channel.description:
Posted this here before but never got round to buying one.
I need a 265mb good quality card for general gaming and a bit of 3d rendering. PCI Express x16
A card that is stable and produces some high quality output.
This?: http://www.amazon.co.uk/XFX-8600GT-620M-256MB-EXPRESS/dp/tech-data/B000P9ZG00/ref=de_a_smtd?ie=UTF8&qid=1213135725&sr=1-1
oh yeh, this is why i wanna change lol NVIDIA GeForce 6100 nForce 405 256mb on-board graphics = crap[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 11-06-2008, 05:40:01[/size][hr]I forgot to ask when playing games could this bad gfx card affect the temp. of my cpu? would a gfx upgrade prevent my cpu getting to hot? My idle cpu temp is usually around 50C which is a bit high isn't it?
